author: indra-ehep
body:
#### PR description:

  - Few validation histograms will be added in the HGCal SimHitValidation folder of DQM root file
  - It does not depend upon other PR
  - This is following the presentation at https://indico.cern.ch/event/1085122/contributions/4563005/attachments/2327395/3965157/2021-10-13_HGCal_in_CMSSW.pdf
    and plan discussed in HGCAL GEANT activity at https://indico.cern.ch/event/1099648/contributions/4627667/attachments/2354197/4016902/2021-11-26_Plan_for_Documentation_and_PR.pdf

#### PR validation:

   All the suggested tests are perfomed as mentioned in https://cms-sw.github.io/PRWorkflow.html including 'scram build code-checks' and 'scram build code-format'

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

   Not applicable.
title: Adding HGCAL simhit validation histograms
